description.value: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the overall outcome of the newborn hearing screening.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

display.value: Newborn hearing screening programme completed, clear response no follow-up required
Newborn hearing screening programme completed, clear response targeted follow-up required
Newborn hearing screening programme completed, no clear response in both ears follow-up required
Newborn hearing screening programme completed, no clear response in one ear, follow-up required
Newborn hearing screening programme incomplete as baby deceased
Newborn hearing screening programme incomplete as baby unsettled
Newborn hearing screening programme incomplete as declined screening
Newborn hearing screening programme incomplete as did not attend appointment
Newborn hearing screening programme incomplete as lack of service capacity
Newborn hearing screening programme incomplete as no current contact details
Newborn hearing screening programme incomplete as outside of area of current screening coverage
Newborn hearing screening programme incomplete as outside screening age range
Newborn hearing screening programme incomplete as screening equipment malfunction
Newborn hearing screening programme incomplete as screening equipment not available
Newborn hearing screening programme incomplete as withdrew consent during screening
